channel.title: Need Development Team - Goliath
channel.description:
[CENTER] [img]https://www.upload.ee/image/5298786/logo.png[/img]
[B][I]Hello, I'm in need of developers for the spots below. The spots listed in green, are available, the spots listed in red, are taken. It'll also contain the person's name beside it. [/I][/B]
Goliath is a server for the players, by the players. I'm not that experienced with coding, but a fast paced learner. I do know how to add models, update basic things, add shops, etc. But I could learn if someone's better than me, assisting me or what not. Basically Goliath is a Ruse based source. However, i'm trying to make it different. In examle, develop the client which makes it different from Ruse. Also update interfaces in-game, and update how things work. I hate to fully leech servers, I want to develop Goliath into something great.
Interested? Use the below format to apply just by simply commenting... [CODE]Age? Position Applying for: Experience: Days a week available: How many hours a day? Proof of work (if possible): Do you have Skype?[/CODE]
Here's the Goliath team positions:
Website Developer Client Developer Head GFX Designer Co-GFX Designer Server Developer 1/2 Part of the team: Arc_
This is my first thread ever posting for a development team, hoping it goes well! Please comment if you're interested using the above format. Thanks, and I hope to have you as a part of the Goliath Development Team![/CENTER]

item.title: Need Development Team - Goliath
item.dc:creator: @skiller8860 skiller8860
item.description:
@skiller8860 wrote:

[CENTER]

[B][I]Hello, I’m in need of developers for the spots below. The spots listed in green, are available, the spots listed in red, are taken. It’ll also contain the person’s name beside it. [/I][/B]

Goliath is a server for the players, by the players. I’m not that experienced with coding, but a fast paced learner. I do know how to add models, update basic things, add shops, etc. But I could learn if someone’s better than me, assisting me or what not. Basically Goliath is a Ruse based source. However, i’m trying to make it different. In examle, develop the client which makes it different from Ruse. Also update interfaces in-game, and update how things work. I hate to fully leech servers, I want to develop Goliath into something great.

Interested? Use the below format to apply just by simply commenting…

Age? Position Applying for: Experience: Days a week available: How many hours a day? Proof of work (if possible): Do you have Skype?

Here’s the Goliath team positions:

Website Developer
Client Developer
Head GFX Designer
Co-GFX Designer
Server Developer 1/2 Part of the team: Arc_

This is my first thread ever posting for a development team, hoping it goes well! Please comment if you’re interested using the above format. Thanks, and I hope to have you as a part of the Goliath Development Team![/CENTER]
